text.div:
Id:
ActivityDefinition/referralPrimaryCareMentalHealth

Status:
draft

Description:
refer to primary care mental-health integrated care program for evaluation and treatment of mental health conditions now

Category:
referral

Code:
text: Referral to service (procedure)
system: http://snomed.info/sct
code: 306206005

Participant:
practitioner

value.name: ReferralPrimaryCareMentalHealth
value.title: Referral to Primary Care Mental Health
value.description: refer to primary care mental-health integrated care program for evaluation and treatment of mental health conditions now
value.purpose: Defines a referral to a mental-health integrated care program for use in suicide risk order sets. The definition is independent of the order set in which it appears to allow reuse of the general definition of the referrral.
value.usage: This activity definition is used as the definition of a referral request within various suicide risk order sets. Elements that apply universally are defined here, while elements that apply to the specific setting of a referral within a particular order set are defined in the order set.
value.copyright: © Copyright 2016 Motive Medical Intelligence. All rights reserved.

relatedArtifact.display: Practice Guideline for the Treatment of Patients with Major Depressive Disorder

value.name: ReferralPrimaryCareMentalHealth
value.title: Referral to Primary Care Mental Health
value.description: refer to primary care mental-health integrated care program for evaluation and treatment of mental health conditions now
value.purpose: Defines a referral to a mental-health integrated care program for use in suicide risk order sets. The definition is independent of the order set in which it appears to allow reuse of the general definition of the referrral.
value.usage: This activity definition is used as the definition of a referral request within various suicide risk order sets. Elements that apply universally are defined here, while elements that apply to the specific setting of a referral within a particular order set are defined in the order set.
value.copyright: © Copyright 2016 Motive Medical Intelligence. All rights reserved.

Id:
ActivityDefinition/referralPrimaryCareMentalHealth

Status:
draft

Description:
refer to primary care mental-health integrated care program for evaluation and treatment of mental health conditions now

Category:
referral

Code:
text: Referral to service (procedure)
system: http://snomed.info/sct
code: 306206005

Participant:
practitioner

parameters.name: composed-of
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the activity definition

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the activity definition

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the activity definition

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The activity definition publication date

parameters.name: depends-on
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: derived-from
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the activity definition

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The time during which the activity definition is intended to be in use

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the activity definition

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the activity definition

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the activity definition

parameters.name: predecessor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the activity definition

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the activity definition

parameters.name: successor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the activity definition

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topics associated with the module

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the activity definition

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the activity definition

resource.name: ReferralPrimaryCareMentalHealth
resource.title: Referral to Primary Care Mental Health
resource.description: refer to primary care mental-health integrated care program for evaluation and treatment of mental health conditions now
resource.purpose: Defines a referral to a mental-health integrated care program for use in suicide risk order sets. The definition is independent of the order set in which it appears to allow reuse of the general definition of the referrral.
resource.usage: This activity definition is used as the definition of a referral request within various suicide risk order sets. Elements that apply universally are defined here, while elements that apply to the specific setting of a referral within a particular order set are defined in the order set.
resource.copyright: © Copyright 2016 Motive Medical Intelligence. All rights reserved.
